isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR 3406B -1991 - DESCRIPTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: The Caterpillar PEEC system is a programmable electronic engine controller for 3406B engines. The PEEC system is comprised of four major engine-mounted components.

svcproc.title: Electronic Engine Control Module (ECM)
svcproc.para: The ECM is a microprocessor-based control module that contains engine performance and emission instructions, and customer specified parameters. It receives information from sensors, switches and relays. This information is used to control the engine and vehicle functions.
